donor_name: UNDP AS ADMINISTRATIVE AGENT FOR A JOINT PROGRAMME PASS THROUGH ARRANGEMENT

outputs.output_descr:
The aim of the project is to effectively facilitate and coordinate the UN Delivering as One initiative in Zambia. Delivering as One is the new way that the UN is going to operate as the UN delivers development assistance. The Government is fully behind a one UN as well as several cooperating partners and civil society. 
The major outcome at the end of the project will be a coordinated, effective and efficient UN system that aims at reducing transaction costs both internally and externally. The project will also contribute to aid coordination thereby making aid more effective.

project_descr: Support to UN Coordination Results and Advocacy
